basics.name: Chloe Teijeiro
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I graduated from the University of Hawaiʻi at West Oʻahu in Spring 2024 with a B.S. in Natural Science, with a concentration in Applied Mathematics. I am currently a Post-Baccalaureate Unclassified student taking Information and Computer Sciences courses at the University of Hawaiʻi at Manoa, and I intend to pursue a career as a data analyst.

education.institution: University of Hawaiʻi–West Oʻahu, Kapolei, HI
education.area: Natural Science with concentration in Applied Mathematics

volunteer.organization: St. John Apostle & Evangelist Catholic Church
highlights: Make all calendars, flyers, and presentations.

awards.title: Graduated with Distinction
awards.awarder: University of Hawaiʻi at West Oʻahu
awards.summary: Awarded to graduates with a minimum UH West Oʻahu cumulative GPA of 3.75, including courses whose credits were not applicable to the degree.

awards.title: Pueo RISE Applied Mathematician
awards.awarder: University of Hawaiʻi at West Oʻahu
awards.summary: Recognized for academic excellence and innovative application of mathematics within the Math, Natural, and Health Sciences Division at UH West O‘ahu.

awards.title: Class Valedictorian
awards.summary: Recognized as Class Valedictorian for achieving the highest academic standing in the graduating class of 2020.
